title: I cant gift myfriend
body: > I added my friend and i tryed to gift him somthing but i cant when i go to the gifting center there says type username of the player i want to gift and then i need to click on his name and then i need to pick what i have to gift .but here i ust cant find him i added him on my friend list but i just cant find him on the list i was wating like 2 hour but i just cant i am lvl 10 and he is lvl 30 please some 1 help me pls

replies.body: The gifting system has some restrictions for security measures, which includes waiting a day to gift someone you recently friended.  Also, you will need to look up his Summoner Name and not his username.  We also have a [gifting guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ)which contains gifting eligibility.  Dry those tears and let me know if that helps!
omg ty so much i love you it helped me alot i readed the gifting guide T-YYYYYðŸ’“ðŸ’“ðŸ’“ðŸ’“
Please guys if you know what to do help me just comment please i begg you pls  i am crying please just commnet what i have to do {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
